### Exercise 1

There are 1846 rows and 3 variables. The variables included are: Dataset, x values, and y values.

### Exercise 2


```{r plot-dino, fig.height=3, fig.width=6}
dino_data <- datasaurus_dozen %>%
  filter(dataset == "dino")
ggplot(data = dino_data, mapping = aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_point()
```


```{r cor-dino}
dino_data %>%
  summarize(r = cor(x, y))
```
